com.github.wuic.engine
Interface SpriteProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
CGAbstractSpriteProvider, CGCssSpriteProvider, CGJavascriptSpriteProvider
public interface SpriteProvider

This interface represents a type of object which provides sprite generation capabilities.

When a set of images is aggregated, then the region of each of them in the generated image is located through a sprite. A sprite could be generated according to specific convention in a chosen language. The implementation of this interface must be able to specify the language through a known FileType.

Since:
0.2.0
Version:
1.1
Author:
Guillaume DROUET

Method Detail

addRegion

void addRegion(Region region,
               String name)

Registers a new region in the image.

Parameters:
region - the region
name - the region name

getSprite

WuicResource getSprite(String url,
                       String groupId)
                       throws IOException

Get the sprite of all the added images in a map associating a FileType as key a WuicResource as value.

Each sprite is in a file associated to a supported FileType which helps to determinate the language used to represent them.

Parameters:
url - of the final image
groupId - the group ID
Returns:
a resource representing the sprite file
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O error occurs while aggregating images

init

void init(String imageName)

Initializes this provider with a new image. Previous regions will be cleared.

Parameters:
imageName - the new image name
